desc.en:
The Adventurer is a Tier II evolution from the Salvager Profession, while keeping all of the Salvager abilities the Adventurer also gains the ability to use Track Dungeons, a powerful skill which lets them track player and system dungeons.

The Adventurer gets a +20% looted money bonus and access to Tier II Salvage goods.

As with the Salvager the Adventuer can use Crossbows, Swords, Fists and Shields.
